item.title: Code opinion: why I prefer avoiding the Async suffix in C# asynchronous methods
item.description: Should every asynchronous method name end with Async? Does it bring more benefits or more downsides? Letâ€™s reason about this habit, which is common among C# developers. Link to article: https://www.code4it.dev/blog/code-opinion-async-suffix/
